title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are found. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name of the element. However, this fully qualified name is not found when searching for declarations.
EB: The Search dialog in the Package view should first try to get the Java element based on the fully qualified name. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR: Update the Search dialog in the Package view to handle the search for declarations correctly. First, try to get the Java element based on the fully qualified name. If that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
